DOC.brief_summary: This study design evaluate efficacy , safety , tolerability RGH-188 monotherapy treatment acute mania . This study 5 week duration ; 3 week double-blind treatment 2-weeks safety follow-up . All patient meet eligibility criterion randomize one two treatment group : RGH-188 placebo

DOC.criteria: Male female inpatient 18 65 year age Meeting DSMIV criterion bipolar I disorder , acute manic mixed episode Having total Young Mania Rating Scale ( YMRS ) score > = 20 score least 4 two follow YMRS item : Irritability , Speech , Content , Disruptive/Aggressive Behavior Patients exhibit abnormality physical examination , abnormal vitalsigns , ECG , clinical laboratory value ( TSH ) . Patients MADRS total score > = 18 Visit 2 . Patients experience first manic episode . Patients receive electroconvulsive therapy ( ECT ) depot neuroleptic 3 month prior Visit 1 .
